text:
With a browser using french as default language, create a new document (File >
New Document)

Javascript error returned by Firefox Javascript Console :

> Error: missing ) after argument list
> Source File: http://localhost/lenya/lenya/javascript/validation.js
> Line: 43, Column: 62
> Source Code:
> alert('Veuillez entrer une valeur valide dans le champ de l'identificateur
(ID).  Les caractères A-Z, a-z, 0-9 ou - sont valides.');

Problem can be solved with 2 little fixes in
./lenya/resources/javascript/validation.xml

49c49
<               alert('<i18n:text key="failmessage.createdoc.required"/>');
---
>               alert("<i18n:text key="failmessage.createdoc.required"/>");
63c63
<               alert('<i18n:text key="failmessage.createdoc.invalidformat"/>');
---
>               alert("<i18n:text key="failmessage.createdoc.invalidformat"/>");
creator: olivier.lustenberger@adm.unige.ch
michi@apache.org
text:
Thanks very much for the patch. Can you confirm that your problem is gone now.

Thanks

Michi

creator: olivier.lustenberger@adm.unige.ch
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Thanks very much for the patch. Can you confirm that your problem is gone now.
> 
> Thanks
> 
> Michi

confirmed, thanks
